articles.title: Walmart Canada names Venessa Yates as new president and chief executive
articles.description: Yates will replace Gonzalo Gebara, who will leave the company at the end of February to return to Argentina to be with his family and pursue other interests
articles.content:
Walmart Canada says Venessa Yates will be the company’s next president and chief executive.
The retailer says Yates has worked with Walmart WMT-N since 2016 and was most recently senior vice-president and general manager of Walmart+, the company’s me... [511 chars]

articles.title: India Eyes Energy Expansion Amid Trump's National Energy Measures
articles.description: Union Minister Hardeep Singh Puri comments on the global energy landscape, emphasizing no shortage of oil and welcoming increased US oil production. Puri highlights potential India-Argentina energy collaboration, underscoring India's rising energy demand and exploring new partnerships to diversify its energy suppliers.
articles.content: Union Minister for Petroleum and Natural Gas, Hardeep Singh Puri, indicated on Monday that India is closely monitoring US President Donald Trump's recent energy-related declarations. Puri highlighted that the global market is witnessing a surge in en... [991 chars]

articles.title: Lionel Messi angers Mexican ex-footballer, fans after controversial gesture during Inter Miami pre-season game
articles.description: After being booed by fans of Mexico City-based Club America at Las Vegas' Allegiant Stadium, Inter Miami's Lionel Messi responded by reminding them of Argentina's 3-0 lead over Mexico in terms of number of World Cups won.

articles.description: Argentina's far-right president was seen sharing a laugh with Italian PM Giorgia Meloni, while UFC boss Dana White and influencers Jake and Logan Paul were also there.
articles.content:
